QuestData.Title: Crouching Carrot, Hidden Turnip
QuestData.Description: Uncle Chen's still got his eye on me, which means I won't be wandering off any time soon. I guess it's up to you to take these turnips... I mean, "carrots"... into the Twisted Warren and deliver them for me.$b$bIt should be pretty simple. Just toss the vegetables in front of virmen, then watch their reaction when they find out it's really a turnip!
QuestData.LogDescription: Toss Orange-Colored Turnips in front of 12 Twitchheel Hoarders.
QuestData.RewardText: Bah ha hah haaaa! I love messing with virmen.
